mdRecord.dcterms:title: Baumanometer
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: W. A. Baum Co. Inc. [manufacturer]
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: The Rector and Visitors of the University of Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:description: The following text is stamped on a metal plate: "Baumanometer REG. U.S. PAT. OFF. STANDARD FOR ACCURACY THE WORLD OVER U.S. PATS. NOS. 1594039 & 1821902 MADE IN U.S.A. W.A. BAUM Co. Inc. - NEW YORK KOMPAK MODEL". The following text is on a nameplate attached to the device: "J.C Hortenstein".
Photographed by Claude Moore Health Sciences Library, Historical Collections and Services staff.
mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: The University of Virginia Medical Artifacts Collection
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Medical instruments and apparatus
